page.title: 06The Spiders Web Motel
page.content: This motel is located in square 05140196 and is sited on approximately 30acres alongside the A41 trunk road. A hotel of the same name was destroyed by fire about l5 years ago and the present motel replaces it. There are 110 rooms on 4 floors, several function suites, a fitness room and a swimming pool in an uninspiring building of brick, steel and glass. Along with the Ladbroke Mercury Hotel in square 05130197 The Spiders Web looks to travelling businessmen using the A41 and M1 for its residential custom (Junction 5 of the M1 is 1 mile NE). In l985 it charges between Â£25 and Â£40 per night for a room. The motel looks to busineses promotions and company functions to supplement its income.
